name: Evelone Wrath
description:
The main character is the popular streamer Evelone192, who has to save Buster and Lixxx!


This game is a story driven narrative where you have to fight, shoot, run away and all in order to save your friends!

Interesting and funny cut-scenes, several mini-games, nice graphics and original 3D models of popular streamers are waiting for you!

You will be able to:
  • Fight with members of the "Anti-Freak Squad" in third-person with cool animations;
  • Shoot with a sniper rifle on the roof;
  • Sweep the rooms with a pistol in first-person.
